comment:
PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All criteria verified with evidence.

FRONTMATTER: title = "VR Compilation Rendering Fixes" (present, non-empty). revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 executable document per SOP-001 Section 5.1 and SOP-002 Section 8).

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and correctly ordered (Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, Execution, Execution Summary, References).

PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9). Execution placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], etc.) in Sections 10-11 are correct per SOP-004 Section 4.1.

EI TABLE: 7 items (EI-1 through EI-7). EI-1 is pre-execution baseline commit per SOP-004 Section 5. EI-7 is post-execution commit per SOP-004 Section 5. EI-4 flagged VR=Yes for integration verification per SOP-002 Section 6.8. All columns present.

TESTING: Both automated verification (specific test updates listed) and integration verification (compile VR and inspect output) addressed per SOP-002 Section 6.8.

DEVELOPMENT CONTROLS: Section 7.4 documents branch isolation (cr-097), write protection, CI verification, PR gate, and submodule update procedure. Qualified State Continuity table (Section 7.5) present with baseline commit f0cd391.

TRACEABILITY: References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, and relevant prior CRs (CR-091, CR-094, CR-095). No new SDLC requirements claimed; refines existing REQ-INT-016/024/025 -- reasonable for rendering-only changes.

FORMATTING: No typos detected. Heading hierarchy consistent. Section numbering sequential. Tables properly formatted. No scar tissue or inconsistencies.

No TU assignment needed for this CR. The changes are confined to qms-cli compilation rendering (interact_compiler.py, commands/interact.py) and their tests. No Flow State application code, UI, or physics engine domains are affected. This is internal QMS tooling refinement within an already-established subsystem.

PRE-REVIEW (re-review after update): COMPLIANT. Full document re-verified.

FRONTMATTER: title = "VR Compilation Rendering Fixes" (present, non-empty). revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 executable document per SOP-002 Section 8).

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and correctly ordered.

PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9). Execution placeholders in Sections 10-11 correct per SOP-004 Section 4.1.

VERIFIED CHANGES: Two locations updated from prior version:
(1) Section 7.4 item 1: now reads "Development in .test-env/qms-cli/ (gitignored)" -- specific path replaces generic description. Improvement.
(2) Section 9.1 step 1: now reads "Clone/update qms-cli into .test-env/qms-cli/ (gitignored working directory)" -- mirrors Section 7.4 update. Internal consistency maintained.

Both changes improve auditability of development controls by specifying the exact test environment path and its gitignored status. No regressions introduced.

EI TABLE: 7 items (EI-1 through EI-7). Baseline commits (EI-1, EI-7) per SOP-004 Section 5. VR-flagged item (EI-4) per SOP-004 Section 9C. All columns present.

TESTING, TRACEABILITY, DEVELOPMENT CONTROLS, FORMATTING: All previously verified items unchanged and compliant. No TU assignment needed -- changes confined to qms-cli compilation rendering internals.
